reviews.review_msg: Takes 8-10 business days to respond to student inquiries. Seemed uninterested in helping students or doing any actual work. I would not recommend this class as a GPA booster especially when the writing is graded as if it's a 400 level class. And that is coming from a 4th year student who has experienced a 400 level writing course.
boring lectures, she is nice HOWEVER! I never knew how my assignments and quizzes are graded based on her standards

Lectures are super boring she could make it interesting but meh. Average grader but if u r good in writing u can score well. Its not a gpa booster course tho, u need to be able to write well while getting rid of ur misogyny LOL or else this class aint for u.
The class was fun, however the course is harder than it show . you have to be consistent and prepare well.
very tough grader. Nice and kind. Gives extensions when needed.

She gave us 20% of participation mark, so join a class is such a important thing.
There are 2 exams(write around 100 words of 5 terms from slides). Both are kinda hard but if you review the slides and listen to lectures, you'll be fine :) and even if you had a bad score, she'll give you a chance to get extra marks, so talk to her! Overall, so nice!

I love Sandie and I will miss her when we end the course. She very nice and you can share everything with her. She always laughs :)) and teaches very easily to understand. Just show up every class and focus on her lecture slide, you will pass
I love her so much!!! She cares about her student and gives high marks for students.
